title: BrightHouse / Time Warner ISP having issues with League.

embed.description: 9 points and 22 comments so far on reddit

body: Hey Riot. I included a link from Reddit from people having a similar issue to mine. This is basically a known issue at this point, but anyone playing under the Bright House, and possibly Time Warner Cable ISP are having packet loss only on League and no where else. I can play any other games online just fine. Basically my ping is up about 20, and it doesn't move. However it feels like I'm playing with anywhere between 200-500 ping and it clearly fluctuates. Not sure what other info you'd might need. Hope it's resolved soon, thanks.

replies.body: Having the same issue. This is way too impossible to play with. I have bright house and i'm sitting at 82 ping (I live in Florida and usually play on 66 ping) but the actual game feels like 300 ping, at certain moments my character just refuses to use abilities for about 7 + seconds. I cant play league like this.
Exact same thing.  Also florida/Brighthouse, only shows a 20ms increase but feels way worse.  This just started today

> [{quoted}](name=AC Aviator,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lAYrb5gU,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-05-09T22:28:55.135+0000)
>
> Exact same thing.  Also florida/Brighthouse, only shows a 20ms increase but feels way worse.  This just started today

Also same, florida but with verizon, initially when the servers moved to chicago i had 33 ping but it went up over time to 57 which i have no problem with tbh, but today i logged in and went straight into a game and i had 75 ping which felt like 150 because packet loss.

This is something we can definitely look into further.  The best way for us to investigate is to [submit a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)and provide the following logs:


1) [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

2) [Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

Our Tech Specialists can take a look in-depth into your connection and hopefully get a better understanding of what is going on in the back-end.
Yep. I have an average of 65 ping in the Southern US with Time Warner, yet packet loss is making it feel wonky and too erroneous to play at all.
Seriously this is insane I can't react or even play the game with the ping that feels like 200+. I feel like pulling my hair out with how bad this is plz do something about this.
